title: [SOLVED]820-3115 - Won't charge battery. See's it and reports it correctly.
message:
Laptop had significant liquid damage.

Ultrasonic'ed it, replaced Q5480 (pins burnt off) and she powered back up.

Got a green light, but never see an orange. Tells me the battery percentage accurately and runs off the battery fine, just never charges it.

Detects the AC in, shows the lightening bolt through the battery, but the light never goes orange and the battery never increases.


Q7055 seems to be unstable.

title: [SOLVED]820-3115 - Won't charge battery. See's it and reports it correctly.
message:
Just tried with another battery and I get an orange light.

Is it possible to fix these batteries?
This one is brand new.

title: [SOLVED]820-3115 - Won't charge battery. See's it and reports it correctly.
message: Batteries cannot be economically fixed, only if you have dozens and dozens.
